1.title: Breaking the Curse Part 1: The Curse is Cast
1.plot: Episode 1 of "Scotty's Culture Shock" dives into the core of the show, Once Upon a Time, with the curse being broken and magic being brought to Storybrooke. Scotty, the host of the show, also interviews Hollywood actor and comedian, Nathanael Feliciano.

2.title: Breaking the Curse Part 2: The Curse is Broken
2.plot: Episode 2 of "Scotty's Culture Shock" discusses in-depth topics related to Once Upon a Time and the aftermath of Emma Swan breaking The Evil Queen's Dark Curse.

3.title: Breaking the Curse Part 3A: Finding Neverland
3.plot: The third episode of "Scotty's Culture Shock" is a two-part as it dives into the first half of Season 3 of Once Upon a Time where Scotty discusses the cast going to Neverland to save Henry from the evil Peter Pan.

4.title: Breaking the Curse 3B: Wicked is Coming
4.plot: The fourth episode of "Scotty's Culture Shock" is a two-part as it dives into the second half of Season 3 of Once Upon a Time where Scotty discusses the cast facing off against The Wicked Witch of the West.

5.title: Breaking the Curse 4A: Let It Go
5.plot: The fifth episode of "Scotty's Culture Shock" is a two-part as it dives into the first half of Season 4 of Once Upon a Time where Scotty discusses the cast being frozen over and helping Elsa locate her long-lost sister, Anna, and ultimately defeat The Snow Queen.

6.title: Breaking the Curse 4B: Heroes and Villains
6.plot: The sixth episode of "Scotty's Culture Shock" is a two-part as it dives into the second half of Season 4 of Once Upon a Time where Scotty discusses the cast being going up against Rumplestiltskin and The Queens of Darkness (Maleficent, Cruella De Vil, and Ursula), as well as trying to give the villains their happy endings by rewriting their stories through The Author, Isaac Heller.

7.title: Breaking the Curse Part 5A: The Dark Swan
7.plot: The seventh episode of "Scotty's Culture Shock" is a two-part as it dives into the first half of Season 5 of Once Upon a Time where Scotty discusses the aftermath of Emma Swan being turned into the Dark One and traveling to Camelot to seek out the Sorcerer, Merlin, to remove the darkness from within her.

8.title: Breaking the Curse Part 5B: Operation Firebird
8.plot: The eighth episode of "Scotty's Culture Shock" is a two-part as it dives into the second half of Season 5 of Once Upon a Time where Scotty discusses the heroes going to the Underworld to rescue Hook, but come into contact with the God and ruler of the Underworld: Hades.

9.title: Breaking the Curse: Bloopers
9.plot: The ninth episode of "Scotty's Culture Shock" is a special feature that goes through all of the bloopers that have occurred during filming/production of the show.

10.title: The Making of Scotty's Culture Shock
10.plot: The tenth episode of "Scotty's Culture Shock" is the season 1 finale. It is the complete documentary of making the show with footage of preproduction, production, and postproduction, including behind the scenes of filming and editing, executive meetings, hair and make up, and even a shot of the studio that "Scotty's Culture Shock" is filmed in. Also, gives an insight of set design and how the finalized pilot episode turned out with the owner of Trash TV Streaming getting a first look at the pilot.

imdb.title: Scotty's Culture Shock
plot: "_Scotty's Culture Shock_ (qv)" is a web series that dives into the basics of the hit television show, Once Upon a Time, with an in-depth analysis about the first five seasons of the show.::Chas Klimczak
